notes: used as a number word or playing card; invariable noun
example_sentence_english: I write three on the sheet.

notes: also used for dates ("il tre" = the third)

example_sentence_english: I have two threes in the deck.

notes: partitive plural form; in context may also mean 'of the three'
example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato dei tre sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I found some threes on the table.
We are talking about the three.
I start from three in the count.
Put the token in the three.
One of the three is tired.
I take the data from the three.
